solution_line_template: After the raise he earns {old_hourly_wage}*{raise_factor}=<<{old_hourly_wage}*{raise_factor}={new_hourly_wage}>>{new_hourly_wage} dollars an hour
He works {hours_per_day} hours per day so earns {new_hourly_wage}*{hours_per_day}=<<{hours_per_day}*{new_hourly_wage}={daily_earnings}>>{daily_earnings} per day
He works {days_per_week} days per week so he earns {daily_earnings}*{days_per_week}=<<{daily_earnings}*{days_per_week}={weekly_earnings}>>{weekly_earnings} a week
His expenses after adding the personal trainer are {old_weekly_bills}+{personal_trainer_cost}=<<{old_weekly_bills}+{personal_trainer_cost}={total_weekly_expenses}>>{total_weekly_expenses} a week
